	<div class="PCD_person_info">

		<p class="verify clearfix"><span class="icon_bed W_fl"><a suda-data="key=pc_apply_entry&amp;value=profile_icon" target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com" class="W_icon_co3 icon_verify_co_v"></a></span></p>		 		 	<p class="info"><span>人民网法人微博</span></p>
			</div>

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4474721250769220" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/IvlQ93e6M?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-22 10:55" date="1582340145000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4474721250769220:fromprofile"> 2月22日 10:55</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/2O2xZO" rel="nofollow">人民网微博</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%237%E8%89%98%E4%B8%89%E5%B3%A1%E6%B8%B8%E8%BD%AE%E9%A9%B0%E6%8F%B4%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%E4%BD%9C%E4%B8%BA%E6%B0%B4%E4%B8%8A%E9%85%92%E5%BA%97%23&amp;from=default">#7艘三峡游轮驰援武汉作为水上酒店#</a>】为缓解武汉酒店接待趋近饱和、各地医护人员住宿紧张，交通运输部门调度7艘三峡游轮紧急驰援武汉，可提供1469个床位。游轮将作为“水上酒店”，为医疗队提供后勤保障服务。船队还配有垃圾处理船，专门处理游船垃圾和油污。<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E7%BD%91%E6%B9%96%E5%8C%97%E9%A2%91%E9%81%93?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=人民网湖北频道">@人民网湖北频道</a><a title="7艘三峡游轮驰援武汉&nbsp;将作为援汉医疗队的“水..." href="http://t.cn/A6hnXOOz" alt="http://t.cn/A6hnXOOz" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_link">O</i>7艘三峡游轮驰援武汉&nbsp;将作为援汉医疗队的“水...</a> ​​​​                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

                    <div class="WB_media_wrap clearfix" node-type="feed_list_media_prev">
        <div class="media_box">

                                                                                                                        <a href="javascript:void(0);" onclick="javascript:window.open('https://service.account.weibo.com/reportspam?rid=IvlM7mBCr&amp;from=10106&amp;type=1&amp;url=%2Frenminwang&amp;bottomnav=1&amp;wvr=5', 'newwindow', 'height=700, width=550, toolbar =yes, menubar=no, scrollbars=yes, resizable=yes, location=no, status=no');">投诉</a>
                                                                                                            </span>
                            </li>

        </div>
    </div>
</div>
                <div class="WB_face W_fl">
            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="人民网"><img usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.24.3.657.657.1024/002uLDeXly8glmohn698dj60j60j6q3b02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609319463&amp;ssig=ft7L00RfXC" width="50" height="50" alt="人民网" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4474718755387827" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/IvlM7mBCr?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-22 10:45" date="1582339550000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4474718755387827:fromprofile"> 2月22日 10:45</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/2O2xZO" rel="nofollow">人民网微博</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【上亿只！】口罩是医务人员抗击疫情的武器，是保护群众健康的盾牌。21日，国务院总理李克强到北京海淀考察医疗防控物资生产供应保障情况。有关部门负责人说，较短时间内实现了全国医用防护服、口罩等产能产量成倍增长。未来还会有大批新的产能投产，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%8F%A3%E7%BD%A9%E6%97%A5%E4%BA%A7%E9%87%8F%E5%8F%AF%E8%BE%BE%E5%88%B0%E4%B8%8A%E4%BA%BF%E5%8F%AA%23&amp;from=default">#口罩日产量可达到上亿只#</a>。<a title="多措并举增加医疗防控物资生产供应&nbsp; 支持疫情..." href="http://t.cn/A6hn99D9" alt="http://t.cn/A6hn99D9" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_link">O</i>多措并举增加医疗防控物资生产供应&nbsp; 支持疫情...</a> ​​​​                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4474717668922148" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/IvlKmBr3C?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-22 10:41" date="1582339291000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4474717668922148:fromprofile"> 2月22日 10:41</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4474711674768896" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/IvlAHk0BG?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-22 10:17" date="1582337862000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4474711674768896:fromprofile"> 2月22日 10:17</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://weibo.com/" rel="nofollow">正能量 · 视频社区</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【最好的爱是什么？是共同战斗】李梅，南昌市东湖区疾控中心检验科科长，把手伸进确诊患者密切接触者的口腔里采集咽拭子，和病毒“零距离”；杨勇，青云谱区疾控中心疫情防控消杀组组长，背60斤消毒器材穿梭在患者住过的地方，与病毒“面对面”。他们是夫妻，也是父母，更是党员、“战士”。<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%88%98%E7%96%AB%E6%B2%99%E7%94%BB%23&amp;from=default">#战疫沙画#</a> ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/IvlAHk0BG" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4474711674768896:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4474711674768896&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                        <!-- 查看对话 -->
                    <!-- 回复 -->
                    <li>
                        <span class="line S_line1"><a href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt1" onclick="return false" action-type="reply" action-data="ouid=5999831366&amp;cid=4474754700771929&amp;nick=小贤今日妈粉&amp;ispower=1&amp;status_owner_user=2286908003&amp;canUploadImage=0&amp;canUploadFunnypic=1">回复</a></span>
                        <span class="arrow"><span class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_bg2_br"></i></span></span>
                    </li>
                    <!-- 回复 -->
                    <!-- 赞 -->
                    <li><span class="line S_line1">

                </ul>
            </div>
            <!-- 时间 -->
                            <div class="WB_from S_txt2">2月22日 13:08</div>

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4474704439955667" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/Ivlp1FLVh?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-22 09:48" date="1582336137000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4474704439955667:fromprofile"> 2月22日 09:48</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【网综新标准出台！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%80%89%E7%A7%80%E8%8A%82%E7%9B%AE%E4%B8%8D%E5%BE%97%E8%AE%BE%E7%BD%AE%E8%8A%B1%E9%92%B1%E4%B9%B0%E6%8A%95%E7%A5%A8%E7%8E%AF%E8%8A%82%23&amp;from=default">#选秀节目不得设置花钱买投票环节#</a>】中国网络视听节目服务协会《网络综艺节目内容审核标准细则》2月21日发布。《细则》提出，综艺节目的主创及出镜人员，不得选用因丑闻劣迹、违法犯罪等行为造成不良社会影响的艺人。选秀及偶像养成类节目中不得设置“花钱买投票”环节。 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/Ivlp1FLVh" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4474704439955667:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4474704439955667&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>
                                                                    <!-- 引用文件时，必须对midia_info赋值 -->
<!-- 微博心情，独立于标准的ul节点 -->
                    <div class="WB_media_wrap clearfix" node-type="feed_list_media_prev">
        <div class="media_box">
            <!--判断图片的个数，渲染图片-->
                            <!--图片个数大于1，不渲染卡片-->
                <!--TODO 只显示图片-->

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【40家机构同时开工 <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%E6%A0%B8%E9%85%B8%E6%A3%80%E6%B5%8B%E5%AD%98%E9%87%8F%E6%B8%85%E9%9B%B6%23&amp;from=default">#武汉核酸检测存量清零#</a>】<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%87%E4%BC%97%E4%B8%80%E5%BF%83%E6%8A%97%E5%87%BB%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%23&amp;from=default">#万众一心抗击疫情#</a> 连日来，武汉40家核酸检测机构同时开工，日均检测量达1.4万份，实现全市临床确诊、疑似、密切接触者、发热患者的核酸检测存量全面清零。最近3天累计进行42515人次的核酸检测工作，21日完成全部存量的取样送检，今后可以做到对“四类人 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/IvljNxt91" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4474701197976859:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4474701197976859&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【湖北新增366例新冠肺炎，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B9%96%E5%8C%97%E7%B4%AF%E8%AE%A1%E6%8A%A5%E5%91%8A%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E63454%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#湖北累计报告新冠肺炎63454例#</a>】<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E6%9C%80%E6%96%B0%E5%8A%A8%E6%80%81%23&amp;from=default">#新冠肺炎最新动态#</a>据湖北省卫健委通报，2月21日0—24时，全省新增新冠肺炎确诊病例366例，其中：武汉市314例、黄冈市16例、荆州市6例、黄石市5例、随州市4例、十堰市3例、仙桃市3例、襄阳市2例、孝感市2例、荆门市2例、鄂州市2例、咸宁市2例 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/IvlfFlqUf" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4474698635108319:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4474698635108319&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%93%9D%E5%A4%A9%E6%95%91%E6%8F%B4%E9%98%9F%E5%91%98%E8%BF%90%E9%80%81%E6%8A%97%E7%96%AB%E7%89%A9%E8%B5%84%E9%81%87%E8%BD%A6%E7%A5%B8%E6%AE%89%E8%81%8C%23&amp;from=default">#蓝天救援队员运送抗疫物资遇车祸殉职#</a> 年仅39岁】21日凌晨4点30分左右，<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E8%93%9D%E5%A4%A9%E6%95%91%E6%8F%B4%E9%98%9F?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=蓝天救援队">@蓝天救援队</a> 机动队队长许鹏在从山东济宁市往武汉运送抗疫物资的途中发生车祸，经抢救无效不幸殉职，年仅39岁！据悉，许鹏此前在武汉做志愿者已经连续工作16天，直到殉职前一直在工作。许鹏朋友圈最后一条的是“美丽的谎言：‘ ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/Ivl9gdAxc" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4474694663238706:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4474694663238706&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%96%E5%8D%AB%E7%BB%84%E7%BB%87%E4%B8%93%E5%AE%B6%E7%BB%84%E5%B0%86%E5%89%8D%E5%BE%80%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%E2%80%8B%23&amp;from=default">#世卫组织专家组将前往武汉​#</a>】在2月21日的媒体通报会上，世界卫生组织总干事谭德塞宣布，中外联合专家组已在北京、四川和广东开展工作，并将于今天（2月22日）前往武汉，在这场疫情的中心继续开展工作。<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E6%97%A5%E6%8A%A5?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=人民日报">@人民日报</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                    <!-- 回复 -->
                    <!-- 赞 -->
                    <li><span class="line S_line1">

            </div>
            <!-- 时间 -->

                                <a name="4474683271642933" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/IvkQT6ToV?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-22 08:24" date="1582331090000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4474683271642933:fromprofile"> 2月22日 08:24</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/2O2xZO" rel="nofollow">人民网微博</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【硬核！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%A4%BE%E5%8C%BA%E5%B7%A5%E4%BD%9C%E4%BA%BA%E5%91%98%E6%9C%BA%E5%85%B3%E6%9E%AA%E5%BC%8F%E5%8A%9D%E5%B1%85%E6%B0%91%E5%9B%9E%E5%AE%B6%23&amp;from=default">#社区工作人员机关枪式劝居民回家#</a> ：回克（去）回克（去）】近日，一段“唠叨姐”劝阻居民不要出门的视频在网上走红。视频中，一位社区工作人员不停对小区想要外出者念叨“回克（去）回克（去）”，她的念叨就像打“机关枪”，外出者硬是被“念叨”逼回家了。<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E7%87%83%E6%96%B0%E9%97%BB?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=燃新闻">@燃新闻</a> <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4474683271642933:2017607-video:2017607%3A4474555402485791:page_100206_home:2286908003:4474683271642933:2286908003" title="燃新闻的秒拍视频" href="http://t.cn/A6hRuy5F" alt="http://t.cn/A6hRuy5F" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>燃新闻的秒拍视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4474675483027235" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/IvkEkcHwn?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-22 07:53" date="1582329232000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4474675483027235:fromprofile"> 2月22日 07:53</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【习近平给比尔·盖茨回信 感谢盖茨基金会支持中国抗击新冠肺炎疫情】国家主席习近平2月20日给美国盖茨基金会联席主席比尔·盖茨回信，感谢他和盖茨基金会对中国防控新冠肺炎疫情工作的支持，呼吁国际社会加强协调、共同抗击疫情。<br>　　习近平在回信中说，在中国抗击新冠肺炎疫情的关键时刻，你和夫人领 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/IvkEkcHwn" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4474675483027235:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4474675483027235&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

                                                                                <li><a action-type="thrid_rend_iframe" href="javascript:void(0)" suda-data="" action-data="width=660&amp;height=556&amp;mid=4474661972354050&amp;src=%2F%2Fpromote.vip.weibo.com%2Fpromoteadvance%3Fdai_tou%3Dpc_profile_01%26touid%3D2286908003%26mid%3D4474661972354050&amp;title=推广" title="帮上头条">帮上头条</a></li>
                                                                                                                    <li><a href="javascript:void(0)" action-data="id=star_1218&amp;isvip=0" action-type="fl_cardCover" suda-uatrack="key=vip_background&amp;value=feed_background_click" title="用此卡片背景">用此卡片背景</a></li>

                <div class="WB_face W_fl">
            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="人民网"><img usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.24.3.657.657.1024/002uLDeXly8glmohn698dj60j60j6q3b02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609319463&amp;ssig=ft7L00RfXC" width="50" height="50" alt="人民网" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4474661972354050" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/Ivkix9Soy?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-22 07:00" date="1582326012000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4474661972354050:fromprofile"> 2月22日 07:00</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/2O2xZO" rel="nofollow">人民网微博</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【18个建议提升人格魅力<img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/c4/2018new_ku_org.png" title="[酷]" alt="[酷]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">】在你看来，一个<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%9C%89%E4%BA%BA%E6%A0%BC%E9%AD%85%E5%8A%9B%E7%9A%84%E4%BA%BA%E6%98%AF%E4%BB%80%E4%B9%88%E6%A0%B7%E7%9A%84%23&amp;from=default">#有人格魅力的人是什么样的#</a>呢？18个建议↓↓ 愿这些小改变，让你更可爱！ ​​​​                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E8%8B%B1%E6%96%87%E5%90%8D%E4%BF%AE%E8%AE%A2%E4%B8%BACOVID-19%23&amp;from=default">#新冠肺炎英文名修订为COVID-19#</a>】国家卫健委下发通知：现决定将“新型冠状病毒肺炎”英文名称修订为“COVID-19”，与世界卫生组织命名保持一致，中文名称保持不变。<a suda-uatrack="key=minicard&amp;value=pagelink_minicard_click" title="网页链接" href="http://t.cn/A6hRk7GR" alt="http://t.cn/A6hRk7GR" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_link">O</i>网页链接</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

        <div class="WB_text">
            <a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/3163659714" usercard="id=3163659714">鑫哆咯</a>：其实就是从NCP（novel corona virus pneumonia）改为了COVID-19（corona virus disease，2019）与世卫组织保持一致了。为啥改名呢？因为pneumonia特指肺炎，而disease泛指疾病，研究发现这个病除了会对肺造成损伤，还有大概20%会对呼吸道、心脏等造成损伤，所以把特指的“肺炎”改为了泛指的“疾病”。        </div>

            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="人民网"><img usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.24.3.657.657.1024/002uLDeXly8glmohn698dj60j60j6q3b02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609319474&amp;ssig=Nd%2Ff8kkQBT" width="50" height="50" alt="人民网" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>
                    </div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4474552497283419" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/IvhrXuyKv?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-21 23:45" date="1582299911000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4474552497283419:fromprofile"> 2月21日 23:45</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/2O2xZO" rel="nofollow">人民网微博</a>            	            </div>

        <!-- 如果返回的为空，但是有二级评论 -->
        <!-- 如果返回有二级评论 -->
        <!-- 为评论假写留下二级评论的样式框架评论 -->
                <div class="list_box_in S_bg3" style="display:none">
            <div class="list_ul" node-type="child_comment">
            <div class="between_line S_bg1"></div>
            </div>
        </div>
                        <!-- 为评论假写留下二级评论的样式框架评论 -->
                 <!-- 如果返回有二级评论 -->
        <!-- 二级评论 -->
        <!-- 对一级评论的操作 -->
    </div>
    <!-- 一级评论用户信息及评论内容 -->
</div>                                        <!-- 一级评论 -->

                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B0%91%E6%B0%91%E5%A4%9C%E8%AF%9D%23&amp;from=default">#民民夜话#</a>【宝贝加油<img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/8a/2018new_xin_org.png" title="[心]" alt="[心]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">】<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E9%93%AE%E8%8F%A0%E6%A4%B0%E5%90%83%E9%A5%B1%E9%A5%B1?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=铮菠椰吃饱饱">@铮菠椰吃饱饱</a>：真好！宝宝要一生平安，健康长大呀！<img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/8a/2018new_xin_org.png" title="[心]" alt="[心]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">//<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E4%B9%85%E4%BB%A4%E5%A4%A7%E5%90%8C%E8%80%80%E5%96%84%E5%88%A9?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=久令大同耀善利">@久令大同耀善利</a>：往后余生平安健康 //<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E6%9C%89%E4%B8%94%E7%91%BE%E6%9C%89%E4%B8%80%E4%B8%AA%E4%BD%A0Life?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=有且瑾有一个你Life">@有且瑾有一个你Life</a>：长大后一定是一个坚强的人<img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/8a/2018new_xin_org.png" title="[心]" alt="[心]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;"> //<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E6%A9%98%E9%A2%82%E8%81%AA%E6%98%8E%E4%BD%86%E4%B8%8D%E7%BB%9D%E9%A1%B6?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=橘颂聪明但不绝顶">@橘颂聪明但不绝顶</a>：以后一定是个很棒的宝贝 //<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E4%B8%8D%E8%B0%88%E6%82%B2%E6%AC%A2?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=不谈悲欢">@不谈悲欢</a>：紧紧的抓着<img class="W_img_face" render="ext" </div>
                                                                        <div class="WB_feed_expand">
                    <div class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_bg1_br"></i></div>
                    <div class="WB_expand S_bg1" node-type="feed_list_forwardContent">
                                                                            <div class="WB_info">
                                <a suda-uatrack="key=feed_headnick&amp;value=transuser_nick:4474484733570985" node-type="feed_list_originNick" class="W_fb S_txt1" nick-name="人民网" bpfilter="page_frame" href="/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="人民网" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_">@人民网</a><a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a>                            </div>
                            <div class="WB_text" node-type="feed_list_reason">
                                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%8C%9D%E4%B8%8D%E5%8F%8A%E9%98%B2%E8%A2%AB%E8%BF%99%E5%8F%AA%E5%B0%8F%E6%89%8B%E6%88%B3%E5%88%B0%23&amp;from=default">#猝不及防被这只小手戳到#</a><img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/8a/2018new_xin_org.png" title="[心]" alt="[心]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">】2月20日，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B5%99%E6%B1%9F%E5%B9%B4%E9%BE%84%E6%9C%80%E5%B0%8F%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E6%82%A3%E8%80%85%E5%87%BA%E9%99%A2%23&amp;from=default">#浙江年龄最小新冠肺炎患者出院#</a>。宝贝，愿你一生勇敢，一世平安！（新华社） ​​​​                                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        【最美相遇！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%86%85%E8%92%99%E5%8F%A4%E7%94%98%E8%82%83%E5%8C%BB%E7%96%97%E9%98%9F%E6%9C%BA%E5%9C%BA%E7%9B%B8%E9%81%87%E9%9A%94%E7%A9%BA%E5%8A%A0%E6%B2%B9%23&amp;from=default">#内蒙古甘肃医疗队机场相遇隔空加油#</a><img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/8a/2018new_xin_org.png" title="[心]" alt="[心]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">】2月21日下午，4架航班抵达武汉天河机场。机上搭乘着176名甘肃医护人员和174名内蒙古医护人员。两支医疗队在机场不期而遇，隔空挥手，高呼“武汉加油，中国必胜！”<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%E4%B8%AD%E7%9A%84%E9%80%86%E8%A1%8C%E8%80%85%23&amp;from=default">#疫情中的逆行者#</a>，请一定平安凯旋！<img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/02/hot_wuhanjiayou_org.png" title="[武汉加油]" alt="[武汉加油]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">（央视）&nbsp;&nbsp;<a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4474541889890184:1034-video:1034%3A4474539892211778:page_100206_home:2286908003:4474541889890184:2286908003" title="人民网的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6hRlPdr" alt="http://t.cn/A6hRlPdr" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民网的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                <ul class="clearfix">

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【人民网评：呵斥夜班护士，良心会不会痛】一场事关生命安危的大营救，不只表现在手术床上的凶险万分，更多时候体现在日常的精心护理。护士和医生一样，都是身着白衣的战士，都是救死扶伤的专业人士，都是战胜疫情的中坚力量，需要得到应有关注和尊重。给生命守护者以守护，是整个社会必须铭记的准则。 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/Ivh8Wau9m" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4474540702499180:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4474540702499180&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%94%B7%E5%AD%90%E4%B8%8D%E6%83%B3%E4%B8%8A%E7%8F%AD%E8%B0%8E%E7%A7%B0%E5%A6%BB%E5%A5%B3%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%23&amp;from=default">#男子不想上班谎称妻女确诊#</a>&nbsp;&nbsp;老板紧急隔离大批员工】近日，苏州的张某因女儿发烧回家照顾，女儿好转后，他打电话给主管，谎称女儿和妻子感染了新冠肺炎。老板赶紧让张某及他接触过的所有员工隔离。民警上门核查却现他撒了谎，本意是想不上班白拿钱。张某被拘10日。<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E6%B1%9F%E8%8B%8F%E6%96%B0%E9%97%BB?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=江苏新闻">@江苏新闻</a> <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4474537821207090:2017607-video:2017607%3A4474459000602639:page_100206_home:2286908003:4474537821207090:2286908003" title="荔直播的秒拍视频" href="http://t.cn/A6h892Pt" alt="http://t.cn/A6h892Pt" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>荔直播的秒拍视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【疫情期间<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%85%92%E7%B2%BE%E6%A3%89%E7%89%87%E6%A3%89%E7%90%83%E5%8F%AF%E5%B0%91%E9%87%8F%E5%B8%A6%E8%BF%9B%E5%8C%97%E4%BA%AC%E5%9C%B0%E9%93%81%23&amp;from=default">#酒精棉片棉球可少量带进北京地铁#</a>】<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%85%92%E7%B2%BE%E6%A3%89%E7%89%87%E6%A3%89%E7%90%83%E8%83%BD%E5%90%A6%E5%B8%A6%E8%BF%9B%E5%9C%B0%E9%93%81%23&amp;from=default">#酒精棉片棉球能否带进地铁#</a>？2月21日<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E5%8C%97%E4%BA%AC%E5%9C%B0%E9%93%81?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=北京地铁">@北京地铁</a> 回应：根据规定，酒精等易燃物品禁止带入轨道交通。疫情爆发以来，广大乘客对于携带酒精棉片、棉球的需求较大，经与公安机关协调，疫情期间原则上由工作人员视情况对于少量携带酒精棉片、棉球的乘客予以放 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/IvgN53Pa2" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4474527150911650:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4474527150911650&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【最浪漫的告白！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%83%E6%97%AC%E7%88%B7%E7%88%B7%E6%89%98%E5%8C%BB%E7%94%9F%E7%BB%99%E9%9A%94%E5%A3%81%E7%97%85%E6%88%BF%E8%80%81%E4%BC%B4%E9%80%81%E8%8A%B1%23&amp;from=default">#七旬爷爷托医生给隔壁病房老伴送花#</a>：康复后家中相会<img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/8a/2018new_xin_org.png" title="[心]" alt="[心]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">】2月19日，武汉协和西院，一位74岁的爷爷在病房请求医生帮他买朵玫瑰，送给住在隔壁病房的老伴。随花一起的还有张小纸条，写着：早日康复，我们在家中相会。奶奶收到花和留言很感动。<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E7%BA%A2%E6%98%9F%E6%96%B0%E9%97%BB?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=红星新闻">@红星新闻</a> <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4474526592886844:2017607-video:2017607%3A4474418974621704:page_100206_home:2286908003:4474526592886844:2286908003" title="红星视频的秒拍视频" href="http://t.cn/A6hQTkjU" alt="http://t.cn/A6hQTkjU" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>红星视频的秒拍视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

        <div class="media_box">

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%96%B9%E8%88%B1%E5%8C%BB%E9%99%A2%E9%87%8C%E7%9A%84%E6%97%A5%E5%B8%B8%23&amp;from=default">#方舱医院里的日常#</a>：热爱生活的人不会被打败！】<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%87%E4%BC%97%E4%B8%80%E5%BF%83%E6%8A%97%E5%87%BB%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%23&amp;from=default">#万众一心抗击疫情#</a>你想象中方舱医院里的“日常”是怎样的？与病毒较量的日子并不轻松，但他们依然热爱生活，锻炼、读书、备考、演小品...方舱医院里的生活比想象中更丰富。不论患者还是医护，都是一群可爱的人！祝愿早日康复，平安回家！<br>​​&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/IvgFwFhxq" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4474522469838868:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4474522469838868&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%9B%9B%E5%B7%9D50%E4%BA%BA%E5%BF%83%E7%90%86%E5%8C%BB%E7%96%97%E9%98%9F%E5%A5%94%E8%B5%B4%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%23&amp;from=default">#四川50人心理医疗队奔赴武汉#</a>】四川第九批援湖北医疗队181人，和第十批50名精神心理专家共计231名医护人员，21日集结奔赴武汉。心理医疗队成员最大年龄58岁、最小年龄27岁。医疗组将分为10个小组，分组投入一线。50人的心理医疗队是目前全国救援队中人数最多的一支。（央视）<a title="四川231人医疗队出发 50名心理专家加入心理战..." href="http://t.cn/A6hR4k6h" alt="http://t.cn/A6hR4k6h" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_link">O</i>四川231人医疗队出发 50名心理专家加入心理战...</a> ​​​​                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

                        <span class="line S_line1"><a href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt1" onclick="return false" action-type="reply" action-data="ouid=5185817263&amp;cid=4474518863045277&amp;nick=老王爷儿&amp;ispower=1&amp;status_owner_user=2286908003&amp;canUploadImage=0&amp;canUploadFunnypic=1">回复</a></span>

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4474514530121732" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/IvgsJ0vFq?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-21 21:14" date="1582290858000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4474514530121732:fromprofile"> 2月21日 21:14</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%89%E5%A4%A7%E8%BF%90%E8%90%A5%E5%95%86%E6%8F%90%E4%BE%9B%E7%9F%AD%E4%BF%A1%E8%A1%8C%E7%A8%8B%E8%AF%81%E6%98%8E%23&amp;from=default">#三大运营商提供短信行程证明#</a>】近日，工信部组织三大运营商，免费提供到访地短信查询服务：编写CXMYD发送至10001(中国电信)、10086(中国移动)、10010(中国联通)，按相应提示查询前14天内到过的、停留4小时以上的具体地市。查询结果可作为本人行程证明使用，也可协助用工单位、相关部门查验流动人员 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/IvgsJ0vFq" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4474514530121732:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4474514530121732&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                                                    <!-- 引用文件时，必须对midia_info赋值 -->
<!-- 微博心情，独立于标准的ul节点 -->
                    <div class="WB_media_wrap clearfix" node-type="feed_list_media_prev">
        <div class="media_box">
            <!--判断图片的个数，渲染图片-->
                            <!--图片个数等于1，只显示图片-->
                
				 		    <!--picture_count == 1-->

                        <span class="line S_line1"><a href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt1" onclick="return false" action-type="reply" action-data="ouid=5237774185&amp;cid=4474514727558016&amp;nick=阿茹WanGru&amp;ispower=1&amp;status_owner_user=2286908003&amp;canUploadImage=0&amp;canUploadFunnypic=1">回复</a></span>
                        <span class="arrow"><span class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_bg2_br"></i></span></span>
                    </li>
                    <!-- 回复 -->
                    <!-- 赞 -->
                    <li><span class="line S_line1">

                </ul>
            </div>
            <!-- 时间 -->
                            <div class="WB_from S_txt2">2月21日 21:15</div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【中共中央政治局研究疫情防控工作】中共中央政治局2月21日召开会议，研究新冠肺炎疫情防控工作，部署统筹做好疫情防控和经济社会发展工作。中共中央总书记习近平主持会议。<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%96%B0%E9%97%BB%E8%81%94%E6%92%AD%E8%AF%B4%23&amp;from=default">#新闻联播说#</a> <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4474511896705768:2017607-video:2017607%3A4474511891038280:page_100206_home:2286908003:4474511896705768:2286908003" title="人民网的秒拍视频" href="http://t.cn/A6hRZsaQ" alt="http://t.cn/A6hRZsaQ" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民网的秒拍视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4474509761308527" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/Ivgl25uph?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-21 20:55" date="1582289722000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4474509761308527:fromprofile"> 2月21日 20:55</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/2O2xZO" rel="nofollow">人民网微博</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%E5%8F%88%E4%B8%80%E4%BD%8D%E5%8C%BB%E7%94%9F%E5%9B%A0%E6%84%9F%E6%9F%93%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E7%A6%BB%E4%B8%96%23&amp;from=default">#武汉又一位医生因感染新冠肺炎离世#</a><img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/16/2018new_lazhu_org.png" title="[蜡烛]" alt="[蜡烛]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">】21日，协和武汉红十字会医院发布公告：普外科医生肖俊在抗击疫情一线不幸感染新冠肺炎，因病情恶化，经抢救无效，于2020年2月8日18时13分去世。据悉，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%82%96%E4%BF%8A%E5%8C%BB%E7%94%9F%23&amp;from=default">#肖俊医生#</a>出生于1970年，在武汉市红十字会医院工作已有29年时间。<a title="公　告" href="http://t.cn/A6hRvxHp" alt="http://t.cn/A6hRvxHp" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_link">O</i>公　告</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4474503419188906" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/IvgaNCysa?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-21 20:30" date="1582288210000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4474503419188906:fromprofile"> 2月21日 20:30</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/2O2xZO" rel="nofollow">人民网微博</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【荆州<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%BF%97%E6%84%BF%E8%80%85%E4%B8%8A%E9%97%A8%E8%A7%A3%E6%95%91%E8%A2%AB%E5%9B%B0%E5%AE%A0%E7%89%A9%23&amp;from=default">#志愿者上门解救被困宠物#</a><img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/42/2018new_baobao_org.png" title="[抱抱]" alt="[抱抱]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">】湖北荆州市流浪小动物保护中心从2月3日起，开始上门解救被困宠物。截至2月20日，已成功救助47例。管理员宝石小赫（网名）说，“完全公益免费就是为了救助更多的小动物”。<img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/8a/2018new_xin_org.png" title="[心]" alt="[心]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;"><a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E6%BE%8E%E6%B9%83%E6%96%B0%E9%97%BB?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=澎湃新闻">@澎湃新闻</a> <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4474503419188906:1034-video:1034%3A4474474091708427:page_100206_home:2286908003:4474503419188906:2286908003" title="澎湃新闻的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6h8YBgX" alt="http://t.cn/A6h8YBgX" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>澎湃新闻的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

    <!-- 一级评论用户信息及评论内容 -->
</div>                                        <!-- 一级评论 -->

            </div>
            <!-- 列表-内容 -->
        </div>
        <!-- 评论-列表 -->
    </div>

                                <a name="4474499645170318" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/Ivg4IlH2e?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-21 20:15" date="1582287309000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4474499645170318:fromprofile"> 2月21日 20:15</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/2O2xZO" rel="nofollow">人民网微博</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【解放军在，人心定！<img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/8a/2018new_xin_org.png" title="[心]" alt="[心]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">】这是一场没有硝烟的战役，但解放军在，人心定！日夜兼程，驰援武汉，军队支援湖北医疗队千里奔袭，义无反顾地战斗在最危险最前线的地方，践行着自己的使命与担当。<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%87%E4%BC%97%E4%B8%80%E5%BF%83%E6%8A%97%E5%87%BB%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%23&amp;from=default">#万众一心抗击疫情#</a>，我们坚信，我们必将赢得胜利！<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%E5%A4%A7%E5%AD%A6%E7%94%9F%E5%9C%A8%E7%BA%BF?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=中国大学生在线">@中国大学生在线</a> <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4474499645170318:1034-video:1034%3A4473978614644740:page_100206_home:2286908003:4474499645170318:2286908003" title="中国大学生在线的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6hlUvre" alt="http://t.cn/A6hlUvre" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>中国大学生在线的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%A9%AC%E6%9D%A5%E8%A5%BF%E4%BA%9A%E6%AD%8C%E6%89%8B%E4%B8%BA%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%E6%8A%97%E5%87%BB%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%E7%8C%AE%E5%94%B1%23&amp;from=default">#马来西亚歌手为中国抗击疫情献唱#</a>】“我们手拉着手，围成铠甲，为你护航。”日前，马来西亚一众本地歌手，为中国抗击新冠肺炎疫情献唱。这首《你从不是一个人》仅用18个小时就完成录音和拍摄，希望能尽早向受疫情影响的中国朋友表达“我们支持你”，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%8A%A0%E6%B2%B9%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%23&amp;from=default">#加油武汉#</a>！<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E6%97%A5%E6%8A%A5%E5%9B%BD%E9%99%85?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=人民日报国际">@人民日报国际</a> <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4474497149115426:1034-video:1034%3A4473021457694730:page_100206_home:2286908003:4474497149115426:2286908003" title="人民日报国际的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6ha2uLg" alt="http://t.cn/A6ha2uLg" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民日报国际的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                    <li><span class="line S_line1">

            <!-- 时间 -->

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4474494859563141" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/IvfWZE7Od?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-21 19:56" date="1582286169000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4474494859563141:fromprofile"> 2月21日 19:56</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/2O2xZO" rel="nofollow">人民网微博</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        中共中央政治局2月21日召开会议，研究新冠肺炎疫情防控工作，部署统筹做好疫情防控和经济社会发展工作。中共中央总书记习近平主持会议。<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E6%96%B0%E5%8D%8E%E8%A7%86%E7%82%B9?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=新华视点">@新华视点</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                                            <li class="hover"><span class="line S_line1"><a class="S_txt1" action-type="shieldComment" action-data="id=6989943951&amp;screen_name=starlight-晗" href="javascript:void(0);">屏蔽</a></span></li>

                    <!-- 删除 -->

                    <!-- 查看对话 -->

                    <li><span class="line S_line1">

            <!-- 时间 -->
                            <div class="WB_from S_txt2">2月21日 19:56</div>

                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4474490996573054" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/IvfQLrzX0?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-21 19:40" date="1582285247000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4474490996573054:fromprofile"> 2月21日 19:40</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【等到那一天，我想第一时间见到你】新冠肺炎疫情防控形势依然严峻，但再长的路也有终点，再黑的夜也会迎来阳光。等到那一天，阳光温暖、空气清新，畅快呼吸、肆意欢喜。等到那一天，可爱可敬的白衣战士们，你们最想做些什么？待到花开疫散时，愿你所得皆所期！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%80%E5%8F%A5%E8%AF%9D%E6%B8%A9%E6%9A%96%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%23&amp;from=default">#一句话温暖武汉#</a> <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4474490996573054:1022-article:1022%3A2309354474491022475515:page_100206_home:2286908003:4474490996573054:2286908003" title="等到那一天，我想第一时间见到你……" href="https://weibo.com/ttarticle/p/show?id=2309354474491022475515" alt="https://weibo.com/ttarticle/p/show?id=2309354474491022475515" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_longwb">°</i>等到那一天，我想第一时间见到你……</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                        <span class="line S_line1"><a href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt1" onclick="return false" action-type="reply" action-data="ouid=5639187699&amp;cid=4474496021087083&amp;nick=Fiction_na&amp;ispower=1&amp;status_owner_user=2286908003&amp;canUploadImage=0&amp;canUploadFunnypic=1">回复</a></span>
                        <span class="arrow"><span class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_bg2_br"></i></span></span>
                    </li>
                    <!-- 回复 -->
                    <!-- 赞 -->
                    <li><span class="line S_line1">

                </ul>
            </div>
            <!-- 时间 -->
                            <div class="WB_from S_txt2">2月21日 20:00</div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%87%E4%BC%97%E4%B8%80%E5%BF%83%E6%8A%97%E5%87%BB%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%23&amp;from=default">#万众一心抗击疫情#</a> 【雷神山医院院长王行环：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%E5%87%BA%E7%8E%B0%E6%98%8E%E6%98%BE%E5%BA%8A%E7%AD%89%E4%BA%BA%E7%8E%B0%E8%B1%A1%23&amp;from=default">#武汉出现明显床等人现象#</a>】2月20日，武汉市新增新冠肺炎患者319例，出院患者766例，出院人数超过新增确诊人数。武汉大学中南医院院长、武汉雷神山医院院长王行环教授表示，武汉出现明显“床等人”现象。<br>“出院患者把床位空出，入院的患者比出院患者少， ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/IvfNrqXhg" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4474488936424394:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4474488936424394&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%8C%9D%E4%B8%8D%E5%8F%8A%E9%98%B2%E8%A2%AB%E8%BF%99%E5%8F%AA%E5%B0%8F%E6%89%8B%E6%88%B3%E5%88%B0%23&amp;from=default">#猝不及防被这只小手戳到#</a><img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/8a/2018new_xin_org.png" title="[心]" alt="[心]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">】2月20日，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B5%99%E6%B1%9F%E5%B9%B4%E9%BE%84%E6%9C%80%E5%B0%8F%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E6%82%A3%E8%80%85%E5%87%BA%E9%99%A2%23&amp;from=default">#浙江年龄最小新冠肺炎患者出院#</a>。宝贝，愿你一生勇敢，一世平安！（新华社） ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="人民网"><img usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.24.3.657.657.1024/002uLDeXly8glmohn698dj60j60j6q3b02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609319480&amp;ssig=j5gEEU%2FaS7" width="50" height="50" alt="人民网" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>
                    </div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4474482133134782" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/IvfCtd9v0?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-21 19:05" date="1582283135000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4474482133134782:fromprofile"> 2月21日 19:05</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【武汉：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%A5%E6%89%93%E7%BA%BF%E4%B8%8A%E5%9B%A2%E8%B4%AD%E6%8D%86%E7%BB%91%E9%94%80%E5%94%AE%23&amp;from=default">#严打线上团购捆绑销售#</a>及操纵哄抬价格】为严厉打击各类价格违法行为，武汉市市场监督管理局发布《关于规范我市疫情防控期间线上团购套餐价格行为的通告》。规定经营者线上团购套餐除标示总价外，内含商品应分别标价，各商品销售价格之和不得低于套餐总价。有线下门店的，线上商品价格不得高于 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/IvfCtd9v0" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4474482133134782:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4474482133134782&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

                                                                                                                        <li><a href="javascript:void(0);" node-type="" action-type="fl_historyEdit" action-data="mid=4474480904553670&amp;domain=100206&amp;is_ori=1&amp;can_edit_count=98" suda-uatrack="">查看编辑记录</a></li>

                                <span class="hover">

                <div class="WB_face W_fl">

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4474480904553670" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/IvfAuj6Ci?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-21 19:00" date="1582282842000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4474480904553670:fromprofile"> 2月21日 19:00</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6ghA0p" rel="nofollow">搜狗高速浏览器</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%BD%A0%E6%83%B3%E4%BD%95%E6%97%B6%E5%BC%80%E5%AD%A6%23&amp;from=default">#你想何时开学#</a>？】日前，江苏省教育厅发布通知，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B1%9F%E8%8B%8F%E6%A0%A1%E5%9B%AD%E9%87%87%E5%8F%96%E5%B0%81%E9%97%AD%E5%BC%8F%E7%AE%A1%E7%90%86%23&amp;from=default">#江苏校园采取封闭式管理#</a> 。不少同学表示，盼着疫情快点过去，尽快回归校园生活。那么，你希望什么时候开学？<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B0%91%E6%B0%91%E5%B0%8F%E8%B0%83%E6%9F%A5%23&amp;from=default">#民民小调查#</a> <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4474480904553670:1022-hudongvote:1022%3A2317162020_291911_-_2cc3b8" title="人民网的微博投票" href="https://vote.weibo.com/h5/index/index?vote_id=2020_291911_-_2cc3b8" alt="https://vote.weibo.com/h5/index/index?vote_id=2020_291911_-_2cc3b8" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_vote">R</i>人民网的微博投票</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【武汉规定：援汉<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%80%E7%BA%BF%E5%8C%BB%E6%8A%A4%E4%BA%BA%E5%91%98%E5%B7%A5%E4%BD%9C10%E5%A4%A9%E8%87%B3%E5%B0%91%E4%BC%912%E5%A4%A9%23&amp;from=default">#一线医护人员工作10天至少休2天#</a>】为进一步做好援汉医疗队服务保障工作，武汉明确提出：一线医护人员工作10天休息不少于2天、医疗队员用餐标准每人每天200元、按照人均6000元标准发放一次性慰问补助等多项政策待遇。（新华社）<a suda-uatrack="key=minicard&amp;value=pagelink_minicard_click" title="网页链接" href="http://t.cn/A6h8lIBY" alt="http://t.cn/A6h8lIBY" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_link">O</i>网页链接</a> ​​​​                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%BD%A0%E4%B8%BA%E4%BB%80%E4%B9%88%E6%83%B3%E4%B8%8A%E7%8F%AD%E4%BA%86%23&amp;from=default">#你为什么想上班了#</a>？】你复工了吗？关于<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%BD%A0%E6%83%B3%E4%B8%8A%E7%8F%AD%E7%9A%84%E7%9C%9F%E5%AE%9E%E7%9B%AE%E7%9A%84%23&amp;from=default">#你想上班的真实目的#</a>，有网友：想出走一段时间，让我妈知道我的重要性；有网友：再不上班就要被发现公司没有我们也能正常运转了；还有网友：去上班有饭吃，一天三顿营养均衡，居家办公做饭太累了… ​​​​<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B0%91%E6%B0%91%E5%B0%8F%E8%B0%83%E6%9F%A5%23&amp;from=default">#民民小调查#</a> 你的理由是？ <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4474474915590875:1022-hudongvote:1022%3A2317162020_291729_-_6b613d" title="人民网的微博投票" href="https://vote.weibo.com/h5/index/index?vote_id=2020_291729_-_6b613d" alt="https://vote.weibo.com/h5/index/index?vote_id=2020_291729_-_6b613d" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_vote">R</i>人民网的微博投票</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                <div class="WB_face W_fl">
            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="人民网"><img usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.24.3.657.657.1024/002uLDeXly8glmohn698dj60j60j6q3b02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609319480&amp;ssig=j5gEEU%2FaS7" width="50" height="50" alt="人民网" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>
                    </div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4474471664824881" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/IvflAkfaF?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-21 18:23" date="1582280639000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4474471664824881:fromprofile"> 2月21日 18:23</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/2O2xZO" rel="nofollow">人民网微博</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【又是一年春光好！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%A9%BA%E4%B8%AD%E4%BA%91%E8%B5%8F300%E4%BA%A9%E6%A2%85%E8%8A%B1%23&amp;from=default">#空中云赏300亩梅花#</a><img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/c9/2018new_chongjing_org.png" title="[憧憬]" alt="[憧憬]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">】春风紧，梅瓣轻。这两天，江苏句容天王镇唐陵村300多亩梅花如画般盛开，姹紫嫣红的色彩将春天的乡村装扮的更加美丽。我们静等疫情过去，静待春暖花开<img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/8a/2018new_xin_org.png" title="[心]" alt="[心]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;"><a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%BE%85%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%E7%BB%93%E6%9D%9F%E5%86%8D%E7%9C%8B%E5%A4%A7%E5%A5%BD%E6%B2%B3%E5%B1%B1%23&amp;from=default">#待疫情结束再看大好河山#</a><a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E8%8D%94%E6%9E%9D%E6%96%B0%E9%97%BB?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=荔枝新闻">@荔枝新闻</a> <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4474471664824881:2017607-video:2017607%3A4474375362248716:page_100206_home:2286908003:4474471664824881:2286908003" title="JSTV荔枝视频的秒拍视频" href="http://t.cn/A6hQwWi2" alt="http://t.cn/A6hQwWi2" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>JSTV荔枝视频的秒拍视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                    <!-- 赞 -->
                </ul>
            </div>
            <!-- 时间 -->
                            <div class="WB_from S_txt2">2月21日 21:24</div>

                                                                                                                        【工作餐，你是自带还是外卖还是食堂呢？】吃货小编逛了一圈<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%A4%8D%E5%B7%A5%E5%90%8E%E6%99%92%E7%9B%92%E9%A5%AD%E5%A4%A7%E8%B5%9B%23&amp;from=default">#复工后晒盒饭大赛#</a>，发现大家的工作餐看起来都太诱人了叭！食堂自制，卫生！单独用餐，安全！网友：有一说一，饭堂的比外卖好吃太多了！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%9A%94%E7%A6%BB%E6%97%A5%E8%AE%B0%23&amp;from=default">#隔离日记#</a>居家办公的小编手里的泡面突然就不香了<img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/6e/2018new_leimu_org.png" title="[泪]" alt="[泪]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;"> ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%88%98%E7%96%AB%E5%85%B3%E9%94%AE%E8%AF%8D%23&amp;from=default">#战疫关键词#</a>：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%88%91%E5%9B%BD%E5%A4%96%E4%BA%A4%E5%AE%98%E7%9A%84%E7%A1%AC%E6%A0%B8%E5%9B%9E%E5%BA%94%23&amp;from=default">#我国外交官的硬核回应#</a>】真金不怕火炼、一力担当、欲言先自省、凛不可欺、速度源于制度…疫情发生以来，我国外交官们迅速行动，面对国际社会对中国防控疫情举措的关注，外交官们用发声诠释了中国公开透明、负责任的大国形象，展示出中国在全球公共卫生治理领域的大国担当。 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/Ivf3rFdgw" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4474460419822444:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4474460419822444&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>
                                                                    <!-- 引用文件时，必须对midia_info赋值 -->
<!-- 微博心情，独立于标准的ul节点 -->
                    <div class="WB_media_wrap clearfix" node-type="feed_list_media_prev">
        <div class="media_box">
            <!--判断图片的个数，渲染图片-->
                            <!--图片个数大于1，不渲染卡片-->
                <!--TODO 只显示图片-->

                                                                                 【<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\"                                                                                  【上亿只！】口罩是医务人员抗击疫情的武器，是保护群众健康的盾牌。21日，国务院总理李克强到北京海淀考察医疗防控物资生产供应保障情况。有关部门负责人说，较短时间内实现了全国医用防护服、口罩等产能产量成倍增长。未来还会有大批新的产能投产，<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\" extra-data=\"type=topic\" title=\"多措并举增加医疗防控物资生产供应  支持疫情...\" href=\"http:\/\/t.cn\/A6hn99D9\" alt=\"http:\/\/t.cn\/A6hn99D9\" action-type=\"feed_list_url\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\"><i class=\"W_ficon suda-data=\"key=tblog_home_new&value=feed_time:4474704439955667:fromprofile\"> 2月22日 09:48<\/a>            \t            <\/div>\n\n            <div class=\"PCD_user_b S_bg1\" node-type=\"follow_recommend_box\" style=\"display:none\"><\/div>\n\n            <div class=\"WB_text W_f14\" node-type=\"feed_list_content\" nick-name=\"人民网\">\n                                                                                                                        【网综新标准出台！<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\" extra-data=\"type=topic\" href=\"\/\/s.weibo.com\/weibo?q=%23%E9%80%89%E7%A7%80%E8%8A%82%E7%9B%AE%E4%B8%8D%E5%BE%97%E8%AE%BE%E7%BD%AE%E8%8A%B1%E9%92%B1%E4%B9%B0%E6%8A%95%E7%A5%A8%E7%8E%AF%E8%8A%82%23&from=default\">#选秀节目不得设置花钱买投票环节#<\/a>】中国网络视听节目服务协会《网络综艺节目内容审核标准细则》2月21日发布。《细则》提出，综艺节目的主创及出镜人员，不得选用因丑闻劣迹、违法犯罪等行为造成不良社会影响的艺人。选秀及偶像养成类节目中不得设置“花钱买投票”环节。                                                                                  【40家机构同时开工 <a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\" extra-data=\"type=topic\" href=\"\/\/s.weibo.com\/weibo?q=%23%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%E6%A0%B8%E9%85%B8%E6%A3%80%E6%B5%8B%E5%AD%98%E9%87%8F%E6%B8%85%E9%9B%B6%23&from=default\">#武汉核酸检测存量清零#<\/a>】<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\" extra-data=\"type=topic\" href=\"\/\/s.weibo.com\/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%87%E4%BC%97%E4%B8%80%E5%BF%83%E6%8A%97%E5%87%BB%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%23&from=default\">#万众一心抗击疫情#<\/a> 连日来，武汉40家核酸检测机构同时开工，日均检测量达1.4万份，实现全市临床确诊、疑似、密切接触者、发热患者的核酸检测存量全面清零。最近3天累计进行42515人次的核酸检测工作，21日完成全部存量的取样送检，今后可以做到对“四类人 ​​​​...<a target=\"_blank\" href=\"\/\/weibo.com\/2286908003\/IvljNxt91\" usercard=\"name=蓝天救援队\">@蓝天救援队<\/a> 机动队队长许鹏在从山东济宁市往武汉运送抗疫物资的途中发生车祸，经抢救无效不幸殉职，年仅39岁！据悉，许鹏此前在武汉做志愿者已经连续工作16天，直到殉职前一直在工作。许鹏朋友圈最后一条的是“美丽的谎言：‘ ​​​​...<a target=\"_blank\"                                                                                  【<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\" ：回克（去）回克（去）】近日，一段“唠叨姐”劝阻居民不要出门的视频在网上走红。视频中，一位社区工作人员不停对小区想要外出者念叨“回克（去）回克（去）”，她的念叨就像打“机关枪”，外出者硬是被“念叨”逼回家了。<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" extra-data=\"type=atname\"                                                                                  【习近平给比尔·盖茨回信 感谢盖茨基金会支持中国抗击新冠肺炎疫情】国家主席习近平2月20日给美国盖茨基金会联席主席比尔·盖茨回信，感谢他和盖茨基金会对中国防控新冠肺炎疫情工作的支持，呼吁国际社会加强协调、共同抗击疫情。<br>　　习近平在回信中说，在中国抗击新冠肺炎疫情的关键时刻，你和夫人领 ​​​​...<a target=\"_blank\"
